document_data.title: Gorlist's Dragon
document_data.author: [[Elaine Cunningham]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"Gorlist's Dragon"''' is a short story by [[Elaine Cunningham]] included in the 2004 anthology ''[[Realms of the Dragons]]'', featuring characters from the [[Starlight & Shadows]] series.
document_data.Summary: [[Gorlist]] seeks to live up the legacy of his mother, the famous gladiator [[Chindra]]. The arena's pit master, [[Slithifar]], schemes to make him lose a fight versus a [[dragon]], thereby allowing her to take him into her bed and brand him as her own.
